sentences.en: A moment or two later champagne in an ice-bucket materialized beside them.
sentences.cn: 片刻之后，他们身边出现了一只装着香槟的冰桶。

sentences.en: As you hum your songs, the water turn to ice above our home.
sentences.cn: 歌词大意： 当你哼你的歌，水变成冰上面我们的家。

sentences.en: Behind us, the Stockholm, an island in itself, nosed into the ice almost up to the stern.
sentences.cn: 我们身后是斯德哥尔摩号，她本身也是一座海岛，船身到船尾几乎完全插入到冰块中。

sentences.en: Caviar and oysters on ice are generally considered the ultimate luxury foods.
sentences.cn: 一般认为，鱼子酱和冰镇牡蛎是顶级美味。

sentences.en: Dick Whittington on Ice.
sentences.cn: 迪克•惠廷顿冰上表演。

sentences.en: He asked for ice for his whiskey and proceeded to get drunk.
sentences.cn: 他要求给他的威士忌里面加冰，接着喝得大醉。

sentences.en: He smiles and swirls the ice ruminatively around his almost empty glass.
sentences.cn: 他微笑着，一边沉思，一边搅动着几乎空了的杯子里的冰块。

sentences.en: Her hands were as cold as ice.
sentences.cn: 她双手冰冷。

sentences.en: His mother's voice was one he knew; ice cold and deadly.
sentences.cn: 母亲的声音是他很熟悉的：冰冷、无情。

sentences.en: Make sure you ice that ankle down as soon as you get inside.
sentences.cn: 一定要一进屋就用冰把脚踝敷上。

sentences.en: My feet were like blocks of ice despite the thermal socks.
sentences.cn: 虽然穿了保暖袜子，我的双脚还是像冰块一样。

sentences.en: Remove the bowl from the ice and stir in the cream.
sentences.cn: 从冰里把碗取出，搅入奶油。

sentences.en: She sucked an ice cube into her mouth, and crunched it loudly.
sentences.cn: 她吸了块冰块到嘴里，嘎嘣嘎嘣地大声嚼着。

sentences.en: The $40 million-a-month aid payments will remain on ice.
sentences.cn: 每月4,000万美元的援助款项将继续搁置下去。

sentences.en: The city spent $7 million to remove snow and ice from the roads.
sentences.cn: 市政府花费了700万美元用于清除路上的冰雪。

sentences.en: The deal was put on ice for three months.
sentences.cn: 该交易被搁置了3个月。

sentences.en: The Italian way is to round off a meal with an ice-cream.
sentences.cn: 意大利人总是在用餐结束时来份冰激凌。

sentences.en: The melting ice caused a rise in sea level.
sentences.cn: 冰川消融造成海平面上升。

sentences.en: The only sound was the crackle of breaking ice.
sentences.cn: 唯一的声响是冰层噼噼啪啪碎裂的声音。

sentences.en: The purpose of the visit was to navigate into an ice-filled fiord.
sentences.cn: 这次出行是为了能驶入冰雪覆盖的峡湾。

sentences.en: They stuffed themselves with ice creams, chocolate and lollies.
sentences.cn: 他们填了一肚子的冰激凌、巧克力和棒棒糖。

sentences.en: We can change ice into water by heating it.
sentences.cn: 通过加热我们可以把冰变成水。

sentences.en: Would you like some ice in your drink?
sentences.cn: 你饮料中要放点冰块吗？

sentences.en: you're &B{skating on thin ice}.
sentences.cn: 你现在处境很 危险。

words.tran_cn: 冰冷的；冷淡的；结满冰的
冷藏工人；给冷藏货车装冰的机器

phrases.tran_cn: 消除紧张；（聚会开始，人们初识时）打破僵局
(冰球)本方半场击球直接至对方半场底线（赢得本方半场底线开球）
（英）冰糕（用果汁等制成的）；（非雪压成的）水冻冰块

trans.tran_en: water that has frozen into a solid state
to cover an injured part of the body in ice to stop it from swelling
